animeTitle: Black Jack: Dr. Pinoko no Mori no Bouken
animeDescription: Dr. Black Jack forgot his doctor's bag, and his assistant (plus self-claimed "wife") Pinoko rushed to deliver the bag but found herself lost in the forest. Guided by a butterfly, she found that many animals in the forest are sick or injured, and Pinoko used her knowledge to help those animals.  (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Black Jack: Futari no Kuroi Isha', 'Black Jack: Futari no Kuroi Isha - Manner Movie']
